Name: Ghouliath
Flavor: Often found in dark places like caves and OTC trading desks.

Name: Inutia
Flavor: A little jumpy. Nose is always wet.

Name: Malalien
Flavor: Do not approach or be approached.

Name: Iblivion
Flavor: Many say it has great potential for growth.

Name: Sofabbi
Flavor: Their carrots make for a good stew.

Name: Pengym
Flavor: Even their ice contains a lot of protein.

Name: Embursa
Flavor: It will use even its own fur as fuel for its fire.

Name: Volthare
Flavor: Its mental circuitry is scattered because of its high speed.
